Text: Firuz Agha Mosque:  It was built by Firuz Ağa, the head treasurer of Sultan Beyazıt II.

<Text: Firuz Agha Mosque:  The mosque is located in the historical center of the city, on the Divanyolu Street, close to other prominent historical landmarks, Sultanahmet Mosque, Aya Sofya and Basilica Cistern.>
Triplets:<Firuz Agha Mosque
